alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 10:11PM EDT until May 14 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river and location in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Riverton. .The last of the river flooding in the National Weather Service Indianapolis area of responsibility is located at Riverton on the Wabash River in southwest Indiana. The river should drop below flood stage by sunrise Saturday. This downward trend on the river is expected to continue for the foreseeable future. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Some agricultural lands underwater. A few rural roads in Crawford County, Illinois close as water backs up Minnow Slough. High water affects campground at Leaverton Park in Palestine. A few private roads near the Gill Township levee in Sullivan County may flood. Water level is at the top of most makeshift levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday /9:00 PM EDT Friday/ the stage was 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday /9:00 PM EDT Friday/ was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.1 feet Monday, May 23. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
